name: death star
manufacturer: Imperial Department of Military Research, Sienar Fleet Systems
description: A Death Star was a gargantuan space station armed with a planet-destroying superlaser powered by kyber crystals.

name: millenium falcon
description: The Millennium Falcon, originally known as YT-1300 492727ZED, was a modified YT-1300 light freighter with a storied history stretching back to the decades before the Clone Wars and the rise of the Galactic Empire.

name: slave I
description: Slave I was a modified Firespray-31-class patrol and attack craft used by the infamous bounty hunter Jango Fett before the Clone Wars and later his unaltered cloned son Boba Fett just prior to the Fall of the Republic and during the reign of the Galactic Empire.

name: dooku's solar sailer
description: The Punworcca 116-class interstellar sloop, also known as the Solar Sailer, was a starship designed and built by the Huppla Pasa Tisc Shipwrights Collective on the planet Geonosis.

name: hammerhead corvette
description: The Hammerhead corvette was a type of corvette that measured 315 meters in length. It was manufactured by Giju General and was used by the Republic Navy during the Clone Wars and the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War.

name: razor crest
description: The Razor Crest was a gunship used by the Mandalorian bounty hunter Din Djarin. It was manufactured by Kuat Systems Engineering, the same company that produced the Delta-7B Aethersprite-class light interceptor flown by Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker during the Clone Wars.

name: stinger mantis
description: The Stinger Mantis was a type of light freighter manufactured by the Corellian Engineering Corporation that was used by the Jedi Order during the Clone Wars.

name: malevolence
description: The Malevolence was a Subjugator-class heavy cruiser that served as the flagship of General Grievous during the Clone Wars. It was equipped with two enormous ion cannons that could disable entire fleets of ships.

name: outrider
description: The Outrider was a modified YT-2400 light freighter that was owned and operated by the smuggler Dash Rendar during the reign of the Galactic Empire.

name: imperial freighter
description: The Imperial freighter was a type of freighter used by the Galactic Empire during the reign of the New Republic. One such freighter was used by the Imperial remnant to transport the Child to Nevarro.

name: ghost
description: The Ghost was a modified VCX-100 light freighter owned by the Twi'lek Hera Syndulla that was used by the Spectres rebel cell during the Age of the Empire.

name: theta class shuttle
description: The Theta-class T-2c shuttle was a multi-purpose transport used by the Galactic Empire. It was manufactured by Cygnus Spaceworks and was designed for a crew of six, including a pilot, co-pilot, navigator, communications officer, gunner, and an engineer.
